Tree Friend of Harris Izael:
I knew that the finder of the Card of Fortune will definitely help me.
But in Fortuna have not only front. Weeping Yui, Infuriated Master Kennen, The Magical Warrior Konyar, Sir The Darkness Resend, The Cowardly Muksu, The Blind Hornaby, Jointoday Expectations...
Now in Fortuna is very dangerous. Be sure to bring 6 friends, who will be able to help You.
(Entry only possible for groups of 7 people.)
